metadata.title: CVE-2021-44122 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SPIP 4.0.0 is affected by a Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilityin ecrire/public/aiguiller.php, ecrire/public/balises.php,ecrire/balise/formulaire_.php. To exploit the vulnerability, a visitor mustvisit a malicious website which redirects to the SPIP website. It is alsopossible to combine XSS vulnerabilities in SPIP 4.0.0 to exploit it. Thevulnerability allows an authenticated attacker to execute malicious codewithout the knowledge of the user on the website (CSRF).

criterions.comment: spip package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
